March 28, 1921
Dear Doctor Hanson:
div1.p:
This will acknowledge the receipt today of
the following cable from Chiclayo:

REPORTS FROM PACASMAYO TRUJILLO INDICATE
CASES FEVER STOP WILL INVESTIGATE AND AD-
VISE

It is disappointing if the infection has
spread to the province of Libertad but it can only mean
that we redouble our efforts to prevent further spread.
We shall eagerly await the results of your investigation.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Doctor Henry Hanson
Direccion de la Campana Sanitaria
Contra la Fiebre Amarilla en los
Departementos del Norte
Chiclayo, Peru
WRR:HJ
